title: Juhi Chawla Spills The Beans On Aamir Khan's Romance With Ex-Wife Reena
text: tweet Juhi Chawla, who has worked with Aamir Khan in several films, had a rather interesting to say about the star. The duo are known to be close friends and Juhi was recently seen attending the success bash of Aamir’s Dangal. When asked about a secret she would love the share about the star, Juhi revealed a big secret about Aamir’s love life. She mentioned some interesting things about the actor’s love affair with ex-wife Reena. Check out the video here: SHARE
